After this error activemq cannot reconnect jms connection

After a while in servicemix log there appears this kinds of errors:
{code}
22:12:53,207 | ERROR | SOME_RESPONSE] | faultJmsMessageListenerContainer | 132 - org.apache.servicemix.bundles.spring-jms - 3.2.11.RELEASE_1 | Could not refresh JMS Connection for destination 'SOMENAME' - retrying in 5000 ms. Cause: Error while attempting to add new Connection to the pool; nested exception is javax.jms.JMSException: Could not create Transport. Reason: java.io.IOException: Broker named 'default' does not exist.
